content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0); warnings: not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); warnings: out of fuel; now associated with fluid_system [81950] and holding approximately 190 units of water (~15°); provides steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); now associated with fluid_system [81950] and holding roughly 99.25 units of water (~15°).
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a Wooden Chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 81950, status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 81949, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 81962, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 81961, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 81957, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 81966, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 81965, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 81968, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 81969, status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 81970, status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Usage:
  - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing inventory items.

• Pipeline Connection and Fluid System Consistency:
  - Repeated attempts to connect the steam engine using fluid_system values (81286, 81370, 81452, 81536, 81618, 81702, 81784, 81868) failed to find any candidate pipe group near Position(-5.5, 19.5).
  - Confirm that the targeted fluid_system identifier corresponds to an active and properly placed pipe group.
  - Dynamically verify nearby pipe group configurations to update connection parameters accordingly, ensuring synchronization with the current pipeline network (e.g., using fluid_system 81950, which is active).
